S.3. Monitoring and evaluation instruments
are available.

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
Our dear alumna/ alumnus,
Greetings from Cavite State University! This is from the Office of Student Affairs and Services-Tanza. We are now conducting a tracer study wherein we would want to know your employment status two (2) years after your graduation. Please check the following options which corresponds to yourself and write the data needed asked for on the spaces provided for. Rest assured that all the information that we could gather from you will be kept confidentially. Thank you very much for your prompt and positive response.
Sincerely, OSAS
Name: _______________________________________ Mobile No. __________________ Course:__________________________ Address: _________________________________ Year Graduated:______________ Email Address: _______________________________ YES NO 1. Employed ____ ____
2. Year Employed: _________
